data.text: @darosenthal I looked it up the moment you tweeted and put it in the shopping cart. DM coordinates.

@OrchidNYC I just finished THE BURIED GIANT which was touching and sad the way sweet old couples can be. 

Now reading THE COLOR OF LAW. Feeling the Bern.
@OrchidNYC I could do an ebook of that one I suppose. Unless print is available at a reasonable rate. I'll have to return the favor next time I see you.

@darosenthal You know which one I'm going to pick, The Great Divergence 🙄 You want an e-book or print?

(Struggling to finish The Sympathizer, not because I don't like it, not ready to finish it. And I just started Her Body and Other Parties. Might go for Lincoln in the Bardo after that)

@OrchidNYC I inhabited your soul for but a moment and all was made clear. 

I've recently wanted to read Call For The Dead by John LeCarré

I've forever wanted to read Kenneth Pomeranz's The Great Divergence

But I would love to read what you would want for me.
@darosenthal You just remember I love Haneke, didn't you?  Or you just knew I'd pick the BEST from the list, didn't you?
@darosenthal YOU WIN!!!!!!!!!  OMG! \o/ You win a book!  Pick one!

@OrchidNYC Happy End

Seems like a good last title
